Text: Many thanks for this outstanding quality book - it is a proper PDF (not OCR'd) with superb quality images, full set of bookmarks, hyperlinked table of contents, even links in the index. Absolutely wonderful. I have downloaded quite a few copies of this (excellent) book, but you should look no further if you want to find out all about AI. I will upload the Instructor's Manual with Exercise Solutions when I can (is also excellent quality).
